Class IntRelationArrays

java.lang.Object
IntRelation
IntRelationArrays
public class IntRelationArrays
extends IntRelation
An implementation of IntRelation using nested arrays. For relations with a small extent this may work faster. However, relations with a large extent use more memory, even when they are sparse (have few related pairs).
Author:
Tom Verhoeff (TU/e)
